body.name: West Bend XL Air Fryer Oven 26-Quart with Digital Controls Easy-View Door and 24 Cooking Presets, Includes Nine Accessories, 1700-Watts, Metallic
features: 24 COOKING PRESETS – This 26-quart capacity XL air fryer oven has one touch time settings for Air Fry, Bagel, Bake, Broil, Chicken, Defrost, Dehydrate, Fish, Fries, Frozen Foods, Grill, Keep Warm, Pizza, Popcorn, Preheat, Proof, Reheat, Roast, Rotisserie, Shrimp, Steak, Toast, Wings, Vegetables
ACCESSORIES – Air fryer basket, air fryer cage, wire rack, bake tray, crumb tray, pizza pan, skewer rack, rotisserie spit and removal handle
AIR FRYER TEMPERATURE CONTROL - Easily set temperature from 80 to 450 degrees Fahrenheit
CONVENIENT FEATURES - Designed with 1700 watts of cooking power, top and bottom heating elements, ergonomic handle, and angled LED digital interface
EASY VIEW – Large easy-view glass door to monitor cooking progress
body.description: Quickly and easily prepare a healthy, delicious feast for your family and friends with the West Bend XL Air Fryer Oven. Our versatile air fryer oven has a 26-quart capacity, so you can enjoy the crispy taste you love without deep frying your food in oil. Take the guesswork out of preparing your favorite foods to crispy perfection with 24 preset functions (Air Fry, Bagel, Bake, Broil, Chicken, Defrost, Dehydrate, Fish, Fries, Frozen Foods, Grill, Keep Warm, Pizza, Popcorn, Preheat, Proof, Reheat, Roast, Rotisserie, Shrimp, Steak, Toast, Wings, Vegetables​). Simply spin the dial to navigate through the options and make your selection. This large-capacity air fryer oven has an LED display that is easy to read and access while you're cooking. A convenient glass window lets you monitor your food as it is prepared to perfection​. The easy-to-grip, ergonomic handle​ is cool to the touch, making it safe to grab while cooking. This large air fryer fits on most countertops, and the sleek look complements any kitchen décor. Cook various foods with the nine included air fryer accessories: air fryer basket, air fryer cage, wire rack, bake tray, crumb tray, pizza pan, skewer rack, rotisserie spit and removal handle. Covered by the West Bend 12-Month Limited Warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Great for preparing family meals or entertaining a group of friends Provides easy access while in use on your countertop 24 convenient presets allow you to cook your favorite recipes with the spin of a dial: Air Fry, Bagel, Bake, Broil, Chicken, Defrost, Dehydrate, Fish, Fries, Frozen Foods, Grill, Keep Warm, Pizza, Popcorn, Preheat, Proof, Reheat, Roast, Rotisserie, Shrimp, Steak, Toast, Wings and Vegetables

Adjustable temperature and time settings allow for versatility Convenient easy-view glass door lets you watch as your favorite foods are cooked to perfection Easy-to-grip, ergonomic handle is cool to the touch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars large air fryer
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift at xmas. Daughter says it works well, but you have to use the settings on the machine, rather than the temps given for general air frying by food manufacturers. She says french fries came out browned and crisp as did chicken tenders. On first use there was a chemical smell, but by second use this was not noticed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like it. Not sure all parts are steel.
reviews.reviewText: Some of the accessory trays etc might be aluminum, which I wouldn’t like.But it is great otherwise. I upgraded from a ninja xl pot-style one which is tricky to clean and to extract hot food from without burning my hand. Some parchment paper over the drip tray and cleaning is then very easy.Also nice that it has the pre settings for air fryer foods, alleviating the need to constantly look them up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and fast cooking
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer has been a great addition to my kitchen appliances. Air fryers are truly versatile and versatile. It's easy to use, allows you to air fry a lot more food at once, and the food comes out great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Missing Oven Racks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of preset options
reviews.reviewText: I really like this air fryer. My family is fairly large so with our old air fryer we had to cook about 1 plate at a time. This was not efficient and took forever to cook a meal for the whole family. This air fryer is much larger and it enables me to cook a meal for the family in much less time.There are lots of cooking preset options and they are all adjustable. The machine preset gives me a starting point and I can adjust the temperature, time and rotation on/off from that preset.I love the rotisserie. Its not huge. I can probably fit a small chicken in it if needed, but thats not usually what I would use an air fryer for. I think the rotisserie is much better sized to cook sausage, popcorn, pumpkin seeds, etc.The back of the air fryer has rubber bumper pads and there are rubber grips on the bottom of the unit. I think an improvement would be to have suction cups to attach to the countertop.Be careful not to scratch the glass. I noticed a scratch on my front glass. I didn't notice the scratch at first so I think I might have scratched the surface when opening the door. Its barely noticeable, but I will be more careful aout opening the door in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality value for money easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We live in a small home and do not have much counter space. I’ve been wanting an air fryer and a toaster oven, but just didn’t know which to go with because we didn’t have the space! When I came across this, I just knew I had to have it. I am so happy we got it! It’s smaller than what I thought it would be, which is perfect for us. It’s still large capacity and can do a lot. Very user-friendly and easy to use. Love all the different features. Comes with everything you need racks rotisserie basket. So happy and I highly recommend definitely would make a great gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice on the counter!
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer looks really nice on my countertop. So far, I have made air fried chickpeas and fancy turkey burgers. There was a great sear on the burgers, and they cooked really well...delicious! It's fairly easy to clean. I like all of the different cooking options and that you can control the temperature and time. I'm not crazy about the loud beep that goes off every time you do something.Unfortunately, the dark round pan came with a dent in it. But overall, with this fryer, I am happy with it.This product is made in China.I hope you found my review helpful!!
